item.title: Rwandan President Blames World's Inaction On Anniversary Of 1994 Genocide
item.description: Rwandan authorities have long blamed the international community for allowing extremists to kill an estimated 800,000 people 30 years ago.
item.content:encoded: Rwandan authorities have long blamed the international community for allowing extremists to kill an estimated 800,000 people 30 years ago.

item.title: Six Months Into The Israel-Hamas War, Here's A Look At Gaza's Destruction By The Numbers
item.description: The offensive in the Palestinian enclave has stretched on for half a year, becoming one of the most destructive and deadly conflicts of the 21st century.
item.content:encoded: The offensive in the Palestinian enclave has stretched on for half a year, becoming one of the most destructive and deadly conflicts of the 21st century.

item.title: Iranian General Warns That Israel's Embassies Are Not Safe After Deadly Strike In Syria
item.description: The remarks about the attack on a diplomatic mission in Damascus come as regional tensions threaten to draw the Middle East into a wider conflict.
item.content:encoded: The remarks about the attack on a diplomatic mission in Damascus come as regional tensions threaten to draw the Middle East into a wider conflict.

item.title: Mexico Severs Diplomatic Ties With Ecuador After Police Storm Its Embassy To Arrest Politician
item.description: Police broke into the Mexican Embassy to arrest a former Ecuadorian vice president who had sought political asylum.
item.content:encoded: Police broke into the Mexican Embassy to arrest a former Ecuadorian vice president who had sought political asylum.

item.title: South African Soccer Player And Olympian Killed In Carjacking At Age 24

item.title: Israel Dismisses 2 Officers Over Deadly Drone Strikes On Aid Workers In Gaza
item.description: The World Central Kitchen food charity called the probe and disciplinary actions “important steps forward," but said systemic change is needed.
item.content:encoded: The World Central Kitchen food charity called the probe and disciplinary actions “important steps forward," but said systemic change is needed.

item.title: Israeli Minister Uses Air Quotes With 'Innocent People In Gaza' Mention
item.description: The dismissive motion came as Economic Minister Nir Barkat claimed that Israel doesn't "want anybody, any civilian, to suffer."
item.content:encoded: The dismissive motion came as Economic Minister Nir Barkat claimed that Israel doesn't "want anybody, any civilian, to suffer."
